welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Aberdare, a charming town nestled in the beautiful landscapes of the United Kingdom. Known for its stunning scenery and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Cardiff Airport offers a variety of amenities and services for travelers.

terminals.name: Executive Lounge
terminals.description: The Executive Lounge at Cardiff Airport provides a comfortable and quiet space for business and first class passengers.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fairwood Comm Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Private Terminal
terminals.description: The private terminal at Fairwood Comm Airport caters to VIP and private jet passengers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
